meta.description: Optimize the cost of meeting nutritional requirements using selected food items.

params.name: protein
params.description: Protein content per unit of each food.

params.name: carbs
params.description: Carbohydrate content per unit of each food.

params.name: calories
params.description: Calorie content per unit of each food.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per unit of each food.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of units of each food to purchase.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of purchasing food items.

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 86 grams of protein are consumed.

constraints.name: carbs_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 120 grams of carbohydrates are consumed.

constraints.name: calories_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 2435 calories are consumed.
